title: 18C.225 MISBRANDED PRODUCTS.
text:
A person may not sell or distribute a misbranded fertilizer, soil amendment, or plant amendment.
A fertilizer, soil amendment, or plant amendment is misbranded if:
(1) it carries a false or misleading statement on the container, on the label attached to the container; or
(2) false or misleading statements concerning the fertilizer, soil amendment, or plant amendment are disseminated in any manner or by any means.
